package.name: Telegram 去除截图限制
package.shortDescription: 部分群组频道开启限制截图功能，安装后可以绕过限制 * 支持 Swiftgram、Turit、iMe、Nicegram * Some group channels have enabled restrictions on screenshotting. After installation, this can bypass the restriction

descriptionlist.description:
## 支持 Swiftgram、Turit、iMe、Nicegram
- 部分群组频道开启限制截图功能，安装后可以绕过限制
- Some group channels have enabled restrictions on screenshotting. After installation, this can bypass the restriction
